data.title: XION Mainnet Event Promethean Saga Official Version Launched
data.description:
Odaily Planet Daily News XION announced the mainnet event Promethean Saga and will launch a week-long "Believers Assemble" recommendation to win points competition. It is reported that Promethean Saga is a chain event lasting several months, which will feature daily exploration, leaderboards and competitions between the community and developers, and explore XION's technological breakthroughs and ecosystem expansion. In addition, XION also plans to turn the application of the Believathon entrepreneurial competition to the mainnet in the coming weeks and months. XION's previously launched Promethean Saga early access version also broke the 150,000 mark in DAU recently.
XION is a wallet-free L1 blockchain designed for consumer popularization through chain abstraction technology. By implementing account abstraction, signature abstraction, fee abstraction, interoperability and other functions at the protocol layer, XION enables developers to create a secure, intuitive and seamless user experience. Previously, the project has raised more than US$36 million from investment institutions such as Multicoin, Animoca, Circle, Hashkey, Arrington Capital, and Spartan.

data.title: On February 5, the US Bitcoin ETF had a net inflow of 2,549 BTC, and the Ethereum TEF had a net inflow of 122,556 ETH
data.description:
Odaily Planet Daily News According to Lookonchain monitoring, on February 5, ten US Bitcoin ETFs had a net inflow of 2,549 BTC (US$248.57 million), of which BlackRock had an inflow of 2,524 BTC (US$246.16 million). BlackRock currently holds 585,398 BTC, equivalent to approximately US$57.09 billion;
Nine Ethereum TEFs had a net inflow of 122,556 ETH (US$336.54 million), of which BlackRock had an inflow of 100,535 ETH (US$276.07 million). BlackRock currently holds 1,352,934 ETH, equivalent to approximately US$3.71 billion.

data.title: Coinbase to List Ether.fi (ETHFI)
data.description: Odaily Planet Daily News According to Coinbase Assets’ announcement on the X platform, Coinbase will add support for Ether.fi (ETHFI) on the Ethereum network (ERC-20 token). If liquidity conditions are met, trading will begin on or after 9 a.m. (Pacific Time) on February 6, 2025. Once the supply of the asset is sufficient, the ETHFI-USD trading pair will be launched in stages. Support for ETHFI may be limited in some supported jurisdictions.

data.title: BlackRock May Launch Bitcoin ETF In Europe
data.description: According to Odaily, Bloomberg analyst James Seyffart shared on the X platform that his colleague Emily Nicolle from Bloomberg News revealed that BlackRock might introduce a Bitcoin ETF in Europe. It is speculated that they will follow the same strategy used in Canada.

data.title: ZachXBT: Entrepreneur Mohammad Dewji MO’s X account was compromised
data.description: Odaily Planet Daily News According to Lookonchain’s previous monitoring, Tanzanian businessman and entrepreneur Mohammed Dewji MO (@moodewji) posted on the X platform that he launched the TANZANIA token and sold it to investors for a profit of $1.48 million, and then deleted all related tweets. However, "chain detective" ZachXBT said that Mohammad Dewji MO's X account had been stolen, so he posted tweets about related tokens.

data.title: Berachain Airdrop Checker is now live
data.description: Odaily Planet Daily News According to official news, the Berachain airdrop checker is now online, and tokens can be collected using EVM wallets (including Metamask, OKX Wallet, etc.) on February 6, 2025.

data.title: BTC rebounded and broke through 98,000 USDT, and the 24-hour decline narrowed to 1.14%
data.description: OKX market shows that BTC rebounded and broke through 98,000 USDT, and is now at 98,008.4 USDT, with the 24-hour decline narrowed to 1.14%. (This newsletter is generated by AI)

data.title: Bloomberg analyst: BlackRock may launch Bitcoin ETF in Europe
data.description: Odaily Planet Daily News Bloomberg analyst James Seyffart posted on the X platform that according to his Bloomberg News colleague Emily Nicolle, BlackRock may launch a Bitcoin ETF in Europe, speculating that they will follow the same strategy used in Canada.

data.title: An entrepreneur launched a Meme token and dumped the market to make a profit of $1.48 million. He has now deleted the promotional tweet
data.description: Odaily Planet Daily News According to Lookonchain monitoring, Tanzanian businessman and entrepreneur Mohammed Dewji MO (@moodewji) launched the TANZANIA token and sold it to investors for a profit of $1.48 million. He distributed 90 SOL (about $18,000) to 20 wallets, and then purchased 793 million TANZANIA (79.5% of the total supply). After completing the position, he announced the contract address, and then sold all 793 million TANZANIA in exchange for 7,373 SOL (about $1.5 million), and finally made a profit of 7,283 SOL (about $1.48 million). At present, he has deleted all related tweets.

data.title: SOL falls below 200 USDT
data.description: OKX market data shows that SOL fell below 200 USDT and is now at 199.84 USDT, a 24-hour drop of 7.55%. (This newsletter is generated by AI)
